results.title: Small town girl
results.creator_credit: Emma Levy, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Emma Levy leaves the confines of small town life in New Zealand for Melbourne in the hope of connecting with a bigger Jewish community. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.

results.title: One wedding and several migrations
results.creator_credit: Adriana Gomberg, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: The dream of happiness is timeless and universal. Adriana Gomberg looks fondly back at her wedding day and recalls the reasons why her and her husband left Brazil to migrate to Australia. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Adriana Gomberg, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: The dream of happiness is timeless and universal. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.

results.title: The Shoemaker
results.creator_credit: Adam Nudelman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Artist Adam Nudelman asks himself why he always paints shoes? Behind these objects lies a story about family and loss and brings him closer to his Jewish heritage. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia
results.creator_credit_for_label: Adam Nudelman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
